title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-6.2 - Horizontal separation requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-6.2 - Horizontal separation requirements

State Regulations

The minimum horizontal separation between the edge of
placed waste and the property line must be 100 feet for any landfill, except
for landfills in Nassau and Suffolk Counties where the minimum separation must
be 50 feet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-6.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
